title: Did Houston's store close on September 11th to honor the September 11th kidnapper?
subtitle: A store at a mall in Houston closed on September 11th to honor a 7th-century religious figure and not one of the September 11 kidnappers.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A store in Houston shopping was closed on September 11th to honor one of the September 11 kidnappers.
